Flow.description: SFCPQBLG-1255 [CPQ] I3 Partner Quoting Changes (Dev Team) SFCPQBLG-799 While creating I3 Pos child quote no parent pickup up list is populating NCR,CPQ - Dec 28, 2021 - SFCPQBLG-614 I3 Partner Enablement ATG - Oct 6, 2021 - Removed the header from the payments only question screen ATG - Sept 21, 2021 - Removed Quote Process ID for Single Site quotes, Added question about Payments Only ATG - Sept 14, 2021 - Added Quote Process ID for Single Site quotes ATG - Sept 9, 2021 - Updated flow API to v52; allows for blanks at the top of picklist values for screen elements NCR,CPQ - Sprint 10 - Lockdown Subscription Term for SMB ATG - 17 Aug, 2021 - Populate Multi-Site Parent Payments Solution text field when creating AE+PP Child quote ATG - July 9, 2021 - Removed header on new screen ATG - July 8, 2021 - Updated multi-site toggle label ATG - July 7, 2021 - Fixed Multi-Site decisions ATG - July 6, 2021 - Added validation on No of Payments Sites for PP Only quotes, TESTING BUG FIX ATG - July 2, 2021 - Set Reasons and Payment Contract End Date on child AE Quote based on value from parent ATG - June 29, 2021 - Updated "Number of Sites" input label to match quote field label ATG - June 22, 2021 - Address issue with multi-site not remembering selection ATG - June 22, 2021 - Fixed Payment site create to populate parent account and multi-site flag ATG - June 14, 2021 - Payment site updates and name ATG - June 8, 2021 - Parent record set update, display quote number + name field ATG - June 1 2021 - Flow multisite decision update ATG - MAY 25, 2021 - Flow multisite enhancements ATG - May 21, 2021 - Combine AOS Create Quote In Community flow
